languages.text: "Гнет Имматериума ощущается по всей системе. Неудивительно, что завеса истощилась именно здесь — Навис Нобилите повелевают течениями варпа, однако их же способности истончают грань между двумя мирами".

traits.locale_text: "Гнет Имматериума ощущается по всей системе. Неудивительно, что завеса истощилась именно здесь — Навис Нобилите повелевают течениями варпа, однако их же способности истончают грань между двумя мирами".

languages.text: "The suffocating grip of the Immaterium can be felt across the entire system. It is not surprising the veil grew thin here of all places — the Navis Nobilite can command the warp currents, but the use of their abilities wears down the barrier between the two worlds."
languages.original_text: "Гнет Имматериума ощущается по всей системе. Неудивительно, что завеса истощилась именно здесь — Навис Нобилите повелевают течениями варпа, однако их же способности истончают грань между двумя мирами".

traits.locale_text: "The tightening grip of the Immaterium can be felt across the entire system. It is not surprising the Veil grew thin here of all places — the Navis Nobilite command the warp currents, but their abilities wear down the barrier between the two worlds."

"The tightening grip of the Immaterium can be felt across the entire system. It is not surprising the Veil grew thin here of all places — the Navis Nobilite command the warp currents, but their abilities wear down the barrier between the two worlds."

"The suffocating grip of the Immaterium can be felt across the entire system. It is not surprising the Veil grew thin here of all places — the Navis Nobilite can command the warp currents, but the use of their abilities wears down the barrier between the two worlds."

"The suffocating grip of the Immaterium can be felt across the entire system. It is not surprising the veil grew thin here of all places — the Navis Nobilite can command the warp currents, but the use of their abilities wears down the barrier between the two worlds."

languages.text: «Todo el sistema sufre por el azote del Inmaterio. No es de extrañar que el velo se debilitara más aquí que en otros lugares. La Navis Nobilite puede dirigir las corrientes de la disformidad, pero ello conlleva el desgaste de la barrera entre los dos mundos».
languages.original_text: "The suffocating grip of the Immaterium can be felt across the entire system. It is not surprising the veil grew thin here of all places — the Navis Nobilite can command the warp currents, but the use of their abilities wears down the barrier between the two worlds."

traits.locale_text: «Todo el sistema sufre por el azote del Inmaterio. No es de extrañar que el velo se debilitara más aquí que en otros lugares. La Navis Nobilite puede dirigir las corrientes de la disformidad, pero ello conlleva el desgaste de la barrera entre los dos mundos».

languages.text: "Der Würgegriff des Immateriums ist im gesamten System zu spüren. Es überrascht nicht, dass der Schleier ausgerechnet hier dünn wird — die Navis Nobilite kann die Warpströmungen befehligen, doch der Gebrauch ihrer Fähigkeiten verschleißt die Barriere zwischen den zwei Welten."
languages.original_text: "The suffocating grip of the Immaterium can be felt across the entire system. It is not surprising the veil grew thin here of all places — the Navis Nobilite can command the warp currents, but the use of their abilities wears down the barrier between the two worlds."

traits.locale_text: "Der Würgegriff des Immateriums ist im gesamten System zu spüren. Es überrascht nicht, dass der Schleier ausgerechnet hier dünn wird — die Navis Nobilite kann die Warpströmungen befehligen, doch der Gebrauch ihrer Fähigkeiten verschleißt die Barriere zwischen den zwei Welten."

languages.text: « La poigne suffocante de l'Immaterium se ressent dans tout le système. Rien de surprenant à ce que le Voile soit plus ténu ici plutôt qu'ailleurs : la Navis Nobilite peut contrôler les courants du Warp, mais plus ses membres utilisent leurs capacités, plus la barrière entre les mondes est fragilisée. »
languages.original_text: "The suffocating grip of the Immaterium can be felt across the entire system. It is not surprising the veil grew thin here of all places — the Navis Nobilite can command the warp currents, but the use of their abilities wears down the barrier between the two worlds."

traits.locale_text: « La poigne suffocante de l'Immaterium se ressent dans tout le système. Rien de surprenant à ce que le Voile soit plus ténu ici plutôt qu'ailleurs : la Navis Nobilite peut contrôler les courants du Warp, mais plus ses membres utilisent leurs capacités, plus la barrière entre les mondes est fragilisée. »

languages.text: “整个星系都能感觉到亚空间令人窒息的力量。这里的屏障这么脆弱，这并不令人意外。导航宗族的成员可以控制亚空间的流动，但他们的能力会让两个世界之间的屏障越来越薄。”
languages.original_text: "The suffocating grip of the Immaterium can be felt across the entire system. It is not surprising the veil grew thin here of all places — the Navis Nobilite can command the warp currents, but the use of their abilities wears down the barrier between the two worlds."

traits.locale_text: “整个星系都能感觉到亚空间令人窒息的力量。这里的屏障这么脆弱，这并不令人意外。导航宗族的成员可以控制亚空间的流动，但他们的能力会让两个世界之间的屏障越来越薄。”

languages.text: 「非物質世界の息が詰まりそうな支配力が星系全体で感じられる。よりによって、ここのヴェールが薄くなっていたとて驚かない…航宙貴族は<歪み>の流れを操ることができるが、彼らの能力を使うとふたつの世界の障壁はすり減ってしまう」
languages.original_text: "The suffocating grip of the Immaterium can be felt across the entire system. It is not surprising the veil grew thin here of all places — the Navis Nobilite can command the warp currents, but the use of their abilities wears down the barrier between the two worlds."

traits.locale_text: 「非物質世界の息が詰まりそうな支配力を星系全体で感じられる。どんな場所の中でも、ここのヴェールが薄くなっていたとて驚かない …航宙貴族は歪みの流れを操ることができるが、彼らの能力を使うとふたつの世界の障壁はすり減ってしまうんだ」
「非物質世界の息が詰まりそうな支配力が星系全体で感じられる。よりによって、ここのヴェールが薄くなっていたとて驚かない…航宙貴族は<歪み>の流れを操ることができるが、彼らの能力を使うとふたつの世界の障壁はすり減ってしまう」

languages.text: "Tindiyar'ın boğucu pençeleri, bütün sistemde hissediliyor. Örtünün onca yer arasından burada incelmesi de şaşılacak şey değil. Navis Nobilite, öte akıntılarına hükmedebilse de güçlerini kullandıkça iki dünya arasındaki bariyeri aşındırmaları kaçınılmaz."
languages.original_text: "The suffocating grip of the Immaterium can be felt across the entire system. It is not surprising the veil grew thin here of all places — the Navis Nobilite can command the warp currents, but the use of their abilities wears down the barrier between the two worlds."

traits.locale_text: "Tindiyar'ın boğucu pençeleri, bütün sistemde hissediliyor. Örtünün onca yer arasından burada incelmesi de şaşılacak şey değil. Navis Nobilite, öteboyut akıntılarına hükmedebilse de güçlerini kullandıkça iki dünya arasındaki bariyeri aşındırmaları kaçınılmaz."
